donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: State capacities for Urban Management and Rehabilitation of Physical Infrastructure strengthened.  The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of the states Ministry of Physical Infrastructure to do urban management and physical infrastructure rehabilitation, to enable Ministry of Housing and Physical Infrastructure plays its policy and quality assurance role in the states and to assure the achievement of project objectives with quality on time and within budget.

project_descr: Provide technical and logistical support to the 10 states of South Sudan and the relevant GRSS level institutions geared at strengthening, consolidating and operationalising basic governance systems at the state level
project_title: Support to the States Programme Phase IV
